  • About Us

Our Company
Marcaria.com is a leading international brand protection company that specializes in international domain registration and trademark registration services. With over 15 years of experience, we have provided services to over 100k and counting, and we do our best to serve them in an efficient, precise manner. Feedback from our clients is taken very seriously and we consistently strive to improve wherever possible.
Our Values
Mission
To help our clients develop & protect their businesses
Vission
To be worldwide recognized by the quality of our service
  • Excellence: We believe that if we are going to do something it is worth to make an extra effort and deliver an exceptional service.
  • Simplicity: Being simple enable us to focus in the important things and to save time and energy to our clients.
  • Relationships: We believe that building strong relationships with our employees, clients and providers is the base for a successful business.
Our Processes
Domain Names
Through Marcaria.com, our clients can register domains in over 800 extensions worldwide and manage all of them simultaneously through our advanced on-line interface.
Trademarks
Each of our clients is assigned to their personal Account Manager whose role it is to oversee all services and communication with our attorneys around the world.
Our Partners
Marcaria.com is an official Domain Registrar accredited by ICANN and by more than 60 countries and 400 registries worldwide. Our accreditations and experience allows us to provide quick and secure management of domain names.
We have over 220 attorneys and law offices throughout the world with whom we work closely. We seek our attorney relationships based on the quality of their work and their success ratings. We are very proud to have developed such a competent partnership base.
Our Clients
Each of our clients has access to their personal Account Manager, whose job it is to oversee the client’s portfolio and manage all communications with our providers. The Account Manager is the go-to contact for our clients, providing a worry-free experience. All of our Account Managers are fluent in English and Spanish but some also speak French, Portuguese, Dutch, German, and Russian.
Our Credentials
Our entire domain processes have also been certified ISO 9001, guarantying the quality and professionalism of our service.
